description:
"Introduction to Guitar" with Rick Spurgin is a course designed for the very beginner. With over 50 video examples along with printable PDFs.

You will start off learning the basics such as, how to hold your guitar and how to properly tune it. You will then learn some easy form chords along with strumming exercises to build your skills. But it doesn't stop there. You will then begin to learn more chords and practice with commonly used chord progressions to develop your chord knowledge. In this course you will learn how to read TAB, rock power chords, and how to play a 12-Bar Blues. At the end of this course you will have the skills that you always wanted to be able to play your favorite songs.

Everyone learns at a different pace. Be patient. Allow yourself a few months of practice with this course to properly develop your new guitar skills.

This course has over 50 small easy to comprehend video lectures to practice with. This allows you to work a little at a time or keep going if you like a faster pace.

If you always wanted to learn the guitar, but just didn't have the time or the budget for private lessons, this is the course for you.
title: Introduction to Guitar "A Course for Beginners"
